hero.title: Biro Administrasi Umum, Keuangan, dan Kepegawaian (BAUKK)
hero.titleEn: Bureau of General Affairs, Finance, and Human Resources (BAUKK)
hero.subtitle: Mengelola sumber daya universitas dengan integritas, transparansi, dan pelayanan prima untuk kemajuan UNAIC.
hero.subtitleEn: Managing university resources with integrity, transparency, and excellent service for the advancement of UNAIC.

services.title: Layanan Keuangan Mahasiswa
services.description: Informasi pembayaran UKT, dispensasi, dan beasiswa internal.
services.descriptionEn: Information on tuition fees (UKT), payment dispensations, and internal scholarships.
services.content:
Kami membantu mahasiswa dalam urusan administrasi keuangan, meliputi:

  1. Pembayaran Uang Kuliah Tunggal (UKT) dan biaya lainnya.
  2. Pengajuan dispensasi pembayaran.
  3. Verifikasi pembayaran wisuda.
services.contentEn:
We assist students in financial administration, including:

  1. Tuition fee (UKT) payments and other fees.
  2. Submission of payment dispensations.
  3. Graduation payment verification.

services.title: Layanan Kepegawaian
services.description: Administrasi dosen dan tenaga kependidikan, kenaikan pangkat, dan kesejahteraan.
services.descriptionEn: Administration for lecturers and staff, promotions, and welfare.
services.content:
Layanan untuk dosen dan karyawan UNAIC:

  1. Pengurusan NIDN/NIDK/NUP.
  2. Pengajuan kepangkatan akademik (Jafung).
  3. Administrasi cuti dan izin studi lanjut.
services.contentEn:
Services for UNAIC lecturers and staff:

  1. Management of NIDN/NIDK/NUP.
  2. Academic rank (Jafung) applications.
  3. Leave administration and study permits.

services.title: Sarana & Prasarana
services.description: Pengelolaan aset, peminjaman ruangan, dan pemeliharaan fasilitas kampus.
services.descriptionEn: Asset management, room booking, and campus facility maintenance.
services.content:
Unit Sarpras melayani:

  1. Peminjaman ruang kelas dan aula.
  2. Perbaikan fasilitas rusak.
  3. Pengadaan barang dan inventaris kampus.
services.contentEn:
The Facilities unit serves:

  1. Classroom and auditorium booking.
  2. Repair of damaged facilities.
  3. Procurement of campus goods and inventory.

services.title: Pengadaan & Logistik
services.description: Layanan pengadaan barang dan distribusi logistik untuk kebutuhan operasional.
services.descriptionEn: Goods procurement and logistics distribution for operational needs.
services.content: Layanan sentralisasi pengadaan untuk unit kerja di lingkungan UNAIC.
services.contentEn: Centralized procurement services for work units within UNAIC.

faqs.question: Bagaimana prosedur pembayaran UKT?
faqs.questionEn: What is the procedure for tuition (UKT) payment?
faqs.answer: Pembayaran UKT dapat dilakukan melalui Virtual Account Bank Syariah Indonesia (BSI) atau Bank Jateng Syariah. Kode bayar dapat dilihat di akun SIAKAD masing-masing.
faqs.answerEn: Tuition payments can be made via Virtual Account at Bank Syariah Indonesia (BSI) or Bank Jateng Syariah. The payment code can be found in each student's SIAKAD account.

faqs.question: Bagaimana cara mengajukan surat keterangan pegawai?
faqs.questionEn: How do I apply for an employment certificate?
faqs.answer: Pegawai dapat mengajukan surat keterangan melalui sistem informasi kepegawaian atau datang langsung ke kantor BAUKK dengan membawa formulir pengajuan.
faqs.answerEn: Employees can apply for a certificate through the human resource information system or visit the BAUKK office directly with an application form.
